reasoning: The screenshot shows a critical server error banner visible in the UI, and the RegularExpressionValidator for the numeric field did not display any validation error message when 'abc' was entered. Both issues indicate actual bugs - either the validation is not working properly or the server error is causing validation to malfunction.
evidence_summary: Screenshot shows 'A critical error has occurred' error banner prominently displayed, with 'abc' in the Max length field and no visible validation error message despite the field having a digits-only regex validator in the code.
scenario_id: DNN_HTML::Module Settings Configuration::Validate setting values - non-numeric input
